item.title: French touch dreamin 2022
item.description: French Touch Dreamin 2022 I was super glad to be Speaker for the first time at the French Touch Dreamin 2022. I had the chance to be asked very interessant questions. A lot of speak was very interesating too. You can check my slide at https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1yqZlCjhDxv6hEJJjoesuwR6RVJ8Xh-k2EA5FPc0vsns/edit?usp=share_link Source code at: https://github.com/jeremyvial/NAD_Grafana Feel free to reach me if you have some issues on git or on my twitter.

item.title: North Africa dreamin 2022
item.description: North Africa Dreamin 2022 What an amazing journey in Maroco for the North Africa Dreamin. I can meet so much people from the Salesforce community comming from so far. This event provided an exceptional platform for networking, learning, and exchanging ideas. Attendees left with valuable insights and a renewed enthusiasm for harnessing the full potential of Salesforce in their organizations. I was very happy to speak for the first time on a public event.

item.title: Create your own Dota 2 overlay for casting Tournament
item.description: Create your own Dota 2 overlay for casting Tournament Just release my article on the overlay I create for Dota 2. You can check it at https://medium.com/@jeremy-vial/create-your-own-dota-2-overlay-for-casting-tournament-an-overview-1e28456a8947

item.title: First article on Medium
